languages.text: {n}Ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}обвинительный тон{/d} разит не хуже молнии, но главное — вслед за вспышкой ужаса и стыда запускает активный мыслительный процесс.{/n}

{n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}обвинительный тон{/d} разит не хуже молнии, но главное — вслед за вспышкой ужаса и стыда запускает активный мыслительный процесс.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}ton accusateur{/d} semble avoir l'effet d'un coup de fouet sur vos sujets dont les visages se déforment de terreur et de honte. Mais surtout, il paraît les encourager à partager les fruits de leurs réflexions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}ton accusateur{/d} semble avoir l'effet d'un coup de fouet sur vos sujets dont les visages se déforment de terreur et de honte. Mais surtout, il paraît les encourager à partager les fruits de leurs réflexions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}糾弾するような口調{/d}は雷のように鋭く響いた。だが本当に重要なのは、相手の顔に一瞬で恐怖と羞恥の色を浮かべさせるだけでなく、彼らの思考を即座に加速させるという点である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}糾弾するような口調{/d}は雷のように鋭く響いた。だが本当に重要なのは、相手の顔に一瞬で恐怖と羞恥の色を浮かべさせるだけでなく、彼らの思考を即座に加速させるという点である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Suçlayıcı tonunla{/d} âdeta yargı dağıtıyorsun. Asıl önemli olansa tebaanın yüzünde dehşet ve utanç ifadesi yaratmanın yanı sıra bilişsel süreçlerini bir anda hızlandırmayı başarman.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Suçlayıcı tonunla{/d} âdeta yargı dağıtıyorsun. Asıl önemli olansa tebaanın yüzünde dehşet ve utanç ifadesi yaratmanın yanı sıra bilişsel süreçlerini bir anda hızlandırmayı başarman.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}tono acusador{/d} los azota como un rayo, pero la parte importante es que además de traer el terror y la vergüenza a los rostros de tus súbditos, acelera drásticamente sus procesos cognitivos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}tono acusador{/d} los azota como un rayo, pero la parte importante es que además de traer el terror y la vergüenza a los rostros de tus súbditos, acelera drásticamente sus procesos cognitivos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}充满谴责意味的话语{/d}仿佛无情的电击一样，所有人的脸都开始发烫。在恐惧与羞耻的鞭策之下，他们变得脑力全开，拼命思考着一切相关的线索。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}accusatory tone{/d} strikes like lightning, but what really matters is that, in addition to bringing a flash of terror and shame to your subjects' faces, it immediately expedites their cognitive processes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}充满谴责意味的话语{/d}仿佛无情的电击一样，所有人的脸都开始发烫。在恐惧与羞耻的鞭策之下，他们变得脑力全开，拼命思考着一切相关的线索。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}anklagender Ton{/d} schlägt ein wie ein Blitz, aber entscheidend ist, dass auf den Gesichtern deiner Untertanen nicht nur Angst und Scham zu sehen sind, sondern auch ihre kognitiven Prozesse beschleunigt werden.{/n}
